attributes.action: Afghan interpreters extended family not be allowed in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The government has just allowed 600 Afghan interpreters  to enter the UK together with their immediate family. As most of them are young men without children they will register their sisters nieces and nephews and there children.

This petition calls on the government to take extra caution in making sure only the immediate family of these  interpreters are allowed to come to the UK.
